translations: 遗漏，省略（omit 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: She omitted information that was material to the case.
We have omitted footnotes which we judged inessential to the text.
sentences.translation: 我们省去了我们认为和正文无关紧要的脚注。

sentences.sentence: Look at the false police reports that omitted or misstated crucial facts.
sentences.translation: 看看那些失实的警方报告吧，它们忽略或谎报了关键的事实。
